Posts.Content: Oct 7, 2007 08:29AM Tammy wrote: I too have the extreme skin sensitivity across my chest after a bi-lateral mastectomy with immed reconstruction 2 1/2 weeks ago (150cc's put in at that time).  My ps says he's never had anyone with pain like this before and will not refill my prescription for pain meds (even though I was down to taking 1/4 of the max dose which made the pain subside).  He put me back on bedrest but we have 6 children and that's kind of hard to do, ya know?  I am so frustrated with this pain and feel like I've taken 2 steps backwards!  In trying to find my own help for the pain, I'm finding so many other women with the same symptoms whose ps are telling them the same thing!  Why isn't this something that they are educated on or at least try to educate themselves on???
Posts.Title: Post surgery NERVE PAIN seacat mjm1
